name: modal-master
description: Comprehensive Modal.com serverless cloud platform expertise. GPU-accelerated Python functions, web endpoints, scheduled tasks, and AI/ML deployments with automatic scaling and per-second billing.
author: Claude Plugin Marketplace

agents.name: modal-expert
agents.description: Expert agent for Modal.com serverless cloud platform. Covers GPU configuration, web endpoints, scheduling, image building, volumes, secrets, parallel processing, and deployment best practices.

slashCommands.name: modal-setup

slashCommands.name: modal-web

slashCommands.name: modal-debug
slashCommands.description: Debug Modal issues including container failures, GPU errors, and deployment problems
